articles.title: 4 Singapore Sailing Federation officials test positive for Covid-19 at Cambodia meet - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Four Singapore Sailing Federation (SSF) officials at the Southeast Asian Sailing Championship in Sihanoukville, Cambodia, have tested positive for Covid-19, said the federation's executive director on Friday (Dec 17).

articles.title: Barely covered: Man in US kicked off flight for wearing red thong as face mask - AsiaOne
articles.description: Tired of face masks, one man decided to vent his frustration by boarding a plane while wearing a rather interesting substitute. Adam Jenne, 38, was booted off a United Airlines domestic flight on Thursday (Dec 16) for not complying with Covid-19 regulations. …
